txt.en: 'I remember the first time I set eyes on your frail body; unscarred, unmarred by battle as if a newborn plucked from suckling. Now, I look upon you are recognize a seasoned warrior who has tasted the flesh of men, dwarves, hobbits and elves. A hero to our cause!\n\n'We have names for people like you and you get to choose which you shall be known by. Just talk to me again and tell me which name we shall call you!'
Veterans of the Battle of the Ettenmoors

As a reward for the efforts of the most vile, depraved and ignoble curs fighting in the Ettenmoors, the War-Tyrants have commissioned new honourifics for those having achieved the rank of Lieutenant and better.
Speak to War-tyrant Akúlhun at Gramsfoot
Speak with War-tyrant Akúlhun again to choose your reward for your continued efforts in the Ettenmoors.
You must choose your reward before 11/1/11
